title: Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch

But all this leads to an epic brawl during the semifinals. However, fans are eager to know its exact release date and where to watch this […] The post Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Eager to find out the release date and time of Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11? Read on to learn all the details, including where to stream.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11 release date and time are right around the corner. In the mid-season finale, Daniel and Johnny train against the backdrop of Barcelona. But all this leads to an epic brawl during the semifinals. However, fans are eager to know its exact release date and where to watch this martial arts comedy-drama series in the U.S. and UK. So, here’s all the information you need to know about Cobra Kai Season 6. When is the Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11 release date & time? The episode’s release date is Thursday, February 13, 2025, and its release time is 12 AM PT. Moreover, the rest of the four episodes from Part 3, including episodes 12, 13, 14, and 15 will be released on this same day. Check out the episode release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern Time February 13, 20253 AMPacific Time February 13, 202512 AMCentral Time (U.S.)February 13, 20252 AMBritish Summer Time (U.K.)February 13, 20259 AM Where to watch Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11 You can watch Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11 via Netflix. Netflix is a popular streaming service that offers subscription-based access to a wide range of movies and TV shows. It mainly features both original content and films and series it has acquired, covering various genres. The platform also is accessible worldwide in several languages. What is Cobra Kai Season 6 about? The official synopsis for Cobra Kai is as follows: “This Karate Kid sequel series picks up 30 years after the events of the 1984 All Valley Karate Tournament and finds Johnny Lawrence on the hunt for redemption by reopening the infamous Cobra Kai karate dojo. This reignites his old rivalry with the successful Daniel LaRusso, who has been working to maintain the balance in his life without mentor Mr. Miyagi.”
html:
The Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11 release date and time are right around the corner. In the mid-season finale, Daniel and Johnny train against the backdrop of Barcelona. But all this leads to an epic brawl during the semifinals. However, fans are eager to know its exact release date and where to watch this martial arts comedy-drama series in the U.S. and UK.

So, here’s all the information you need to know about Cobra Kai Season 6.

When is the Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is Thursday, February 13, 2025, and its release time is 12 AM PT. Moreover, the rest of the four episodes from Part 3, including episodes 12, 13, 14, and 15 will be released on this same day.

Check out the episode release times in the U.S. below:

Where to watch Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11

You can watch Cobra Kai Season 6 Episode 11 via Netflix.

Netflix is a popular streaming service that offers subscription-based access to a wide range of movies and TV shows. It mainly features both original content and films and series it has acquired, covering various genres. The platform also is accessible worldwide in several languages.

What is Cobra Kai Season 6 about?

The official synopsis for Cobra Kai is as follows:

“This Karate Kid sequel series picks up 30 years after the events of the 1984 All Valley Karate Tournament and finds Johnny Lawrence on the hunt for redemption by reopening the infamous Cobra Kai karate dojo. This reignites his old rivalry with the successful Daniel LaRusso, who has been working to maintain the balance in his life without mentor Mr. Miyagi.”
